body: This surprisingly ornate and heavy volume is more than three-quarters empty. Tightly written notes on the precepts of arcane defense and the vulnerabilities of supernatural entities fill the first two pages.
name: Defensive Primer (Level 1 Abjurer)

sections.body: 1st—burning hands, detect undead, expeditious retreat, magic missile, protection from evilS, ray of enfeeblement, shieldS
